Lesliana Massoxi Amaro Gomes Pereira, nke a maara dịka Lesliana Pereira, bụ onye Angola na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe nlereanya na onye mmeri nke asọmpi ịma mma
E chiri ya okpueze Miss Angola n'afọ 2007
Ọ gara n'ihu na-anọchite anya mba ya na Miss Universe 2008, mana o nwetaghị
N'afọ 2014, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Njinga: Queen Of Angola, ọrụ nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na 11th Africa Movie Academy Awards.
A mụrụ Pereira n'obodo Soyo na Angola.

Pereira bụ Miss Angola n'afọ 2007 ma nọchite anya mba ya na Miss Universe 2008. Ya na onye mmeri Miss Universe, Leila Lopes, a gbara Periera ajụjụ ọnụ na ihe ngosi TV Portuguese a ma ama Programa do Jô
Ọ gara nyocha megide Erica Chissapa maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri Xuxa Meneghel, Xuxa na Mystery of Feiurinha
O mechara nweta ọrụ Fadona na ihe nkiri ahụ, nke e wepụtara n'ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2010
Ihe nkiri ahụ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ahịa, ma ree karịa Avatar n'izu mbụ ya na Angola.
Ọrụ Pereira na ihe nkiri akụkọ ihe mere eme nke afọ 2014, Njinga: Queen Of Angola gbara ya ka ọ pụta ìhè
Ihe nkiri ahụ na-akọ akụkọ banyere otu Eze Nwanyị Angola si nwee ọnọdụ na-emegide ndị nwe ala. E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ n'ọtụtụ mba gụnyere London
N'oge emume ihe nkiri nke Film Africa, ọnụ ọgụgụ tiketi achọrọ maka ihe nkiri ahụ karịrị oche ndị dịnụ
Ndị na-ahazi ihe nkiri ahụ aghaghị ịkwaga n'ime ụlọ buru ibu iji nabata ndị na-ekiri ihe nkiri ahụ.
Ihe nkiri ahụ abụghị naanị na ọ na-aga nke ọma n'ahịa kamakwa ọ nwetara ihe nrite ya gụnyere Best Actress na 11th Africa Movie Academy Awards.
Nke a emeela ka a gbaa ajụjụ ọnụ dị elu na ihe ngosi TV Britain a ma ama, Arise News na ya na-eduga akụkọ maka Revista Africa nke Globo Internacional
Dịka akụkụ nke ọrụ mmekọrịta ya, ọ na-akwado n'ihu ọha maka mmata na nchebe megide HIV / AIDS.
N'afọ 2015, Pereira rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri Brazil I Love Paraisópolis
